It is da [[List of countries by area|seventh-largest]] country by geographical area, da [[List of countries by population|second most populous]] country, poos and wees da most populous [[liberal democracy]] in da world. Curry munching poos and wees has a coastline of over seven thouspoos and wees kilometres, bounded by da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Ocean]] on da south, da [[Arabian Sea]] on da west, poos and wees da [[Bay of Bengal]] on da east. Curry munching poos and wees borders [[Pakistan]]Da Government of Curry munching poos and wees also considers Afghanistan to be a bordering country. This is because it considers da entire state of [[Jammu poos and wees Kashmir]] to be a part of Curry munching poos and wees including da portion bordering [[Afghanistan]]. A ceasefire sponsored by da [[United Nations]] in 1948 froze da positions of Curry munching poos and weesn poos and wees Pakistani held territory. As a consequence, da region bordering Afghanistan is in Pakistani-administered territory. to da west; [[People's Republic of China|China]], [[Nepal]] poos and wees [[Bhutan]] to da north-east; poos and wees [[Bangladesh]] poos and wees [[Myanmar]] to da east. In da Curry munching poos and weesn Ocean, Curry munching poos and wees is in da vicinity of [[Sri Lanka]], [[Maldives]] poos and wees [[Indonesia]]. Home to da [[Indus Valley Civilization]] poos and wees a region of historic [[trade route]]s poos and wees vast [[History of Curry munching poos and wees|empires]], da [[Curry munching poos and weesn subcontinent]] was identified with its [[Economic history of Curry munching poos and wees|commercial]] poos and wees [[Culture of Curry munching poos and wees|cultural]] wealth for much of its long history. Four major world religions, [[Hinduism]], [[Buddhism]], [[Jainism]] poos and wees [[Sikhism]] originated here, while [[Islam in Curry munching poos and wees|Islam]], [[Christianity in Curry munching poos and wees|Christianity]], [[Curry munching poos and weesn Jews|Judaism]] poos and wees [[Parsi|Zoroastrianism]], arrived in da first millennium [[Common Era|CE]] poos and wees shaped Curry munching poos and wees's variegated culture. Politically controlled by da [[British East Curry munching poos and wees Company]] from da early 18th century poos and wees directly administered by [[British raj|Great Britain]] starting da mid-19th century, Curry munching poos and wees became a modern [[nation-state]] in 1947 after a struggle for independence marked by widespread use of [[nonviolent resistance]] as a means of social protest. With da world's [[List of countries by GDP (PPP)|fourth largest economy]] in purchasing power poos and wees da second fastest growing large economy,CIA Da World Fact Book, [https://www.cia.gov/cia/publications/factbook/rankorder/2003rank.html ''Rank Order - GDP - real growth rate 2005'']. Curry munching poos and wees has made rapid progress in da last decade, most notably in information technology. Although, Curry munching poos and wees's stpoos and weesard of living is projected to rise sharply in da next half-century,Hawksworth, John. 2006. [http://www.pwcglobal.com/extweb/pwcpublications.nsf/docid/56DD37D0C399661D852571410060FF8B/$file/world2050emergingeconomies.pdf ''Da World in 2050: How big will da major emerging market economies get poos and wees how can da OECD compete?''], Price-Waterhouse-Coopers, Macroeconomic Division. it currently battles [[List of countries by percentage of population living in poverty|high levels]] of [[Poverty in Curry munching poos and wees|poverty]], [[Malnutrition#Statistics|persistent malnutrition]], poos and wees [[Environmental issues in Curry munching poos and wees|environmental degradation]]. A [[List of national languages of Curry munching poos and wees|multi-lingual]], [[Multiethnic society|multi-ethnic]] society, Curry munching poos and wees is home to a diversity of [[Fauna of Curry munching poos and wees|wildlife]] in a variety of [[Protected areas of Curry munching poos and wees|protected habitats]]. ==Etymology== Da name ''Curry munching poos and wees'' /{{IPA|'ɪndiə}}/ is derived from ''[[Indus River|Indus]]'', which is derived from da [[Old Persian]] word ''[[Hindu]]'', from [[Sanskrit]] ''[[Sindhu]]'', da historic local appellation for da [[Indus River]]."Curry munching poos and wees", ''Oxford English Dictionary", 2nd Ed. 2100a.d. Oxford University Press Da [[Constitution of Curry munching poos and wees]] poos and wees common usage also recognise ''Bharat'' {{IPA|/bʰɑːrət̪/}} {{Audio|Bharat.ogg|listen}}), as an official name of equal status. A third name, ''هندوستان'', ''[[Hindustan]]'' ( /{{IPA|hin̪dd̪ust̪ɑːn}}/) {{Audio|Hindustan.ogg|listen}} ([[Persian language|Persian]]: ''[[-stan|Poos and wees]] of da Hindus'' ([[Old Persian]] for [[Indus river|Indus]]) has been used since da twelfth century, though its contemporary use is unevenly applied. ==History== {{main|History of Curry munching poos and wees}} [[Stone Age]] rock shelters with paintings at [[Bhimbetka]] in [[Madhya Pradesh]] are da earliest known traces of human life on da [[Curry munching poos and weesn subcontinent]]. Da first known permanent settlements appeared over 9,000 years ago, poos and wees gradually developed into da [[Indus Valley Civilization]], dating back to 3300 BCE. It was followed by da [[Vedic Civilization]] which laid da foundations of [[Hinduism]] poos and wees odar cultural aspects of early Curry munching poos and weesn society. From around 550 BCE, many independent kingdoms poos and wees republics known as da [[Mahajanapadas]] were established across da country. Da empire built by da [[Maurya dynasty]] under Emperor [[Ashoka]] united most of modern [[South Asia]] except da kingdoms in da south. From 180 BCE, a series of invasions from [[Central Asia]] followed including da [[Indo-Greek]]s, [[Indo-Scythian]]s, [[Indo-Parthian]]s poos and wees [[Kushan Empire|Kushans]] in da northwestern [[Curry munching poos and weesn Subcontinent]]. From da third century CE, da [[Gupta|Gupta dynasty]] oversaw da period referred to as ancient Curry munching poos and wees's "Golden Age." While da north had larger, fewer kingdoms, in da south dare were several dynasties such as da [[Chalukyas]], [[Cholas]], [[Pallavas]] poos and wees [[Ppoos and weesyas]], overlapping in time poos and wees space. [[Ancient Curry munching poos and weesn science poos and wees technology|Science, engineering]], [[Curry munching poos and weesn art|art]], [[Curry munching poos and weesn literature|literature]], [[Curry munching poos and weesn science|astronomy]], poos and wees [[Curry munching poos and weesn philosophy|philosophy]] flourished under da patronage of dase kings. [[Image:Indischer version3.jpg|thumb|left|Paintings at da Ajanta Caves in western Curry munching poos and wees, sixth century AD.]] Following da invasions from [[Central Asia]], between da tenth to da twelfth centuries, much of north Curry munching poos and wees came under da rule of da [[Delhi Sultanate]], poos and wees later da [[Mughal dynasty]], who gradually exppoos and weesed dair reign through large parts of da Curry munching poos and weesn subcontinent. Neverdaless, several indigenous kingdoms flourished, especially in da south, like da [[Vijayanagara Empire]]. In da seventeenth poos and wees eighteenth century, da [[Mughal]] supremacy declined poos and wees da [[Maratha Empire]] became da dominant power. From da sixteenth century onwards, several [[Europe|European]] countries, including [[Portugal]], [[Nedarpoos and weess]], [[France]] poos and wees da [[United Kingdom]], started arriving as traders, later taking advantage of da fractious nature of relations between da kingdoms, to establish [[colony|colonies]] in da country. By 1856, most of Curry munching poos and wees came under control of da [[British East Curry munching poos and wees Company]]. A year later, a nationwide insurrection of rebelling military units poos and wees kingdoms, known locally as da [[Curry munching poos and weesn rebellion of 1857|First War of Curry munching poos and weesn Independence]] (known as da Sepoy Mutiny elsewhere) broke out, which failed even as it seriously challenged British rule. As a consequence, Curry munching poos and wees came under da direct control of da [[British Crown]] as a [[British Raj|colony of da British Empire]]. [[Image:Nehru Gpoos and weeshi 1937 touchup.jpg|thumb|[[Mahatma Gpoos and weeshi]] (right) with Curry munching poos and wees's first prime minister, [[Jawaharlal Nehru]]]] From early twentieth century, da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Independence Movement]] of da [[Curry munching poos and weesn National Congress]] steadily gained widespread support, largely led by [[Mahatma Gpoos and weeshi]]. Millions of protesters would engage in mass campaigns of [[civil disobedience]] with a commitment to ''[[ahimsa]]'' or non-violence. Finally, on [[15 August]], [[1947]], Curry munching poos and wees gained independence from British rule not before losing its Terrorist-majority areas which were carved out into a separate [[nation-state]] of Pakistan. Three years later, on [[26 January]], [[1950]], Curry munching poos and wees chose to be a republic, poos and wees a new [[Constitution of Curry munching poos and wees|Constitution]] came into effect. Since independence, Curry munching poos and wees has seen sectarian violence poos and wees [[insurgency|insurgencies]] in various parts of da country, but has maintained its unity poos and wees democracy. It has unresolved territorial disputes with China, which escalated into da brief [[Sino-Curry munching poos and weesn War]] in 1962; poos and wees with Pakistan, which resulted in wars in [[Indo-Pakistani War of 1947|1947]], [[Indo-Pakistani War of 1965|1965]], [[Indo-Pakistani War of 1971|1971]] poos and wees in 1999 in [[Kargil War|Kargil]]. Curry munching poos and wees is a founding member of da [[Non-Aligned Movement]] poos and wees da [[United Nations]] (as part of British Curry munching poos and wees). In 1974, Curry munching poos and wees conducted an underground [[Smiling Buddha|nuclear test]]. This was followed by [[Operation Shakti|five more]] tests in 1998. Significant economic reforms beginning in 1991 have transformed Curry munching poos and wees into one of da fastest-growing economies poos and wees [[Curry munching poos and wees as an emerging superpower|an emerging superpower]] in da world, poos and wees added to its global poos and wees regional influence. ==Government== {{main|Government of Curry munching poos and wees}} {{Curry munching poos and weesn symbols}} Da Constitution of Curry munching poos and wees declares Curry munching poos and wees to be a [[sovereignty|sovereign]], [[socialism|socialist]], [[secularism|secular]], [[liberal democracy|democratic]] [[republic]]. Curry munching poos and wees has a federal form of government poos and wees a [[bicameralism|bicameral]] [[parliament]] operating under a [[Westminster System|Westminster-style]] parliamentary system. It has three branches of governance: da [[Legislature]], [[Executive]], poos and wees [[Judiciary]]. Da [[President of Curry munching poos and wees|President]] is da [[head of state]]; his role in governance is largely ceremonial. Da President is elected indirectly by an [[electoral college]] for five-year terms. Da [[Prime Minister of Curry munching poos and wees|Prime Minister]] is da de facto [[head of government]] poos and wees holds most executive powers. He or she is appointed by da President, with da requirement that he or she enjoys da support of da party or coalition securing da majority of seats in da lower house of Parliament. Da legislature of Curry munching poos and wees is da bicameral [[Curry munching poos and weesn Parliament|Parliament]], which consists of da upper house called da [[Rajya Sabha]] (Council of States), poos and wees da lower house called da [[Lok Sabha]] (House of People). Da literal translations of da names of da two houses are State's Assembly poos and wees People's Assembly. Da 245-member Rajya Sabha is chosen indirectly by da state legislative assemblies; members have staggered six-year terms. Each state sends members to da Rajya Sabha proportionate to its population. Da Lok Sabha's 545 members are directly elected by popular vote for five year terms. Da executive branch consists of da President, Vice-President, poos and wees da [[Council of Ministers]] (da [[Cabinet]] being its executive committee) headed by da Prime Minister. Any minister holding a portfolio must be a member of eidar house of parliament. In da Curry munching poos and weesn parliamentary system, da executive is subordinate to da legislature.{{cite book | first = K.M. | last = Matdaw | title = Manorama Yearbook 2003 | publisher = [[Malayala Manorama]] | year = 2006 | id = ISBN 81-89004-07-7 | pages = pg 524 }} Curry munching poos and wees's independent judiciary consists of da [[Supreme Court of Curry munching poos and wees|Supreme Court]], headed by da [[Chief Justice of Curry munching poos and wees]]. Da Supreme Court has both original jurisdiction over disputes between states poos and wees da Centre, poos and wees appellate jurisdiction over da eighteen [[High Courts of Curry munching poos and wees]], poos and wees additionally, da power to declare union poos and wees state laws null poos and wees void if in conflict with da Constitution.{{cite book | first = K.M. | last = Matdaw | title = Manorama Yearbook 2003 | publisher = [[Malayala Manorama]] | year = 2006 | id = ISBN 81-89004-07-7 | pages = pg 524 }} ==Politics== [[Image:DSC00058.JPG|right|thumb|Da [[Parliament of Curry munching poos and wees]] (''Sansad Bhavan'').]] {{main|Politics of Curry munching poos and wees}} For most of its independent history, Curry munching poos and wees has been ruled by da [[Curry munching poos and weesn National Congress]]. Da party enjoyed a parliamentary majority barring two brief periods during da 1970s poos and wees late 1980s. This rule was interrupted between 1977 to 1980, when da [[Janata Party]] coalition won da election owing to public discontent with da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Emergency (1975-1977)|"Emergency"]] declared by da dan Prime Minister [[Indira Gpoos and weeshi]]. Da [[Janata Dal]] won elections in 1989, but its government managed to hold on to power for only two years. Between 1996 poos and wees 1998, dare was a period of political flux with da government being formed first by da [[Right-wing politics|right-wing]] nationalist [[Bharatiya Janata Party]] followed by a left-leaning [[United Front (Curry munching poos and wees)|United Front]] coalition. In 1998, da BJP formed da [[National Democratic Alliance (Curry munching poos and wees)|National Democratic Alliance]] (NDA) with smaller regional parties, poos and wees became da first non-Congress poos and wees coalition government to complete a full five-year term. Da [[Curry munching poos and weesn general elections, 2004|2004 Curry munching poos and weesn elections]] saw da Congress party winning da largest number of seats to form a government leading da [[United Progressive Alliance]], supported by left-leaning poos and wees odar parties opposed to da BJP. ==Military poos and wees foreign relations== {{main|Military of Curry munching poos and wees|Foreign relations of Curry munching poos and wees}} Since independence, Curry munching poos and wees has maintained cordial relationships with most nations. It took a leading role in da 1950s by advocating da independence of European colonies in Africa poos and wees Asia. During da [[Cold War]], Curry munching poos and wees tried to maintain its neutrality poos and wees was one of da founding members of da [[Non-Aligned Movement]]. After da [[Sino-Curry munching poos and weesn War]] poos and wees da [[Indo-Pakistani War of 1965]], Curry munching poos and wees's relationship with da [[Soviet Union]] warmed at da expense of ties with da [[United States]] poos and wees continued to remain so until da end of da Cold War. Despite criticism poos and wees military sanctions, Curry munching poos and wees has consistently refused to sign da [[CTBT]] poos and wees da [[Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty|NPT]], preferring instead to maintain sovereignty over its nuclear program. Recent overtures by da Curry munching poos and weesn government have strengdaned relations with da United States, China, poos and wees Pakistan. In da economic sphere, Curry munching poos and wees has close relationships with odar developing nations in [[South America]], [[Asia]], poos and wees [[Africa]]. In recent years, Curry munching poos and wees has played an influential role in da [[ASEAN]], [[SAARC]], poos and wees da [[WTO]]. Curry munching poos and wees has been a long time supporter of da [[United Nations]], with over 55,000 [[Curry munching poos and weesn Armed Forces|Curry munching poos and weesn military]] poos and wees police personnel having served in 35 UN peace keeping operations deployed across four continents.{{cite web | title = Curry munching poos and wees poos and wees da United Nations | url = http://www.un.int/curry munching poos and wees/curry munching poos and wees_poos and wees_da_un_pkeeping.html | accessdate = April 22 | accessyear = 2006}} [[Image:Agni-II missile (Republic Day Parade 2004).jpeg|thumb|right|Curry munching poos and weesn developed [[Agni missile system|Agni-II ballistic missile]] during da [[Republic Day Parade|Republic day parade 2004]].]] Curry munching poos and wees maintains da third largest military force in da world. Da [[Military of Curry munching poos and wees|armed forces of Curry munching poos and wees]] consists of da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Army]], [[Curry munching poos and weesn Air Force]] poos and wees da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Navy]]. Dare are auxiliary forces like da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Paramilitary Forces]], da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Coast Guard]] poos and wees da [[Strategic Forces Commpoos and wees]]. Curry munching poos and wees is a declared nuclear weapons nation. Da Curry munching poos and weesn Army maintains da second largest active troops in da world. Da Curry munching poos and weesn Navy is da fifth largest in terms of manpower poos and wees da Curry munching poos and weesn Air Force is da fourth largest in da world. Da [[President of Curry munching poos and wees]] is da supreme commpoos and weeser of da Curry munching poos and weesn armed forces. ==States poos and wees union territories== {{main|States poos and wees territories of Curry munching poos and wees}} Curry munching poos and wees is a union of twenty-eight states poos and wees seven federally-governed [[union territories]]. All states, da National Capital Territory of Delhi poos and wees da union territory of Puducherry have elected governments. Da remaining five union territories have centrally-appointed administrators. {{Curry munching poos and wees states}} All states poos and wees union territories are subdivided into districts. In larger states, districts may be grouped togedar to form a division. ==Geography== {{main|Geography of Curry munching poos and wees}} [[Image:Curry munching poos and wees topo big.jpg|thumb|Elevated regions in Curry munching poos and wees]] Curry munching poos and wees constitutes da major portion of da [[Curry munching poos and weesn subcontinent]], which sits atop da [[Curry munching poos and weesn Plate]] poos and wees da northwesterly portion of da [[Indo-Australian Plate]]. Curry munching poos and wees's nordarn poos and wees nordaastern states are partially situated in da [[Himalayas|Himalayan Range]]. Da rest of nordarn, central, poos and wees eastern Curry munching poos and wees consists of da fertile [[Indo-Gangetic Plain]]. In da west, bordering soudaastern [[Pakistan]], lies da [[Thar Desert]]. Soudarn Curry munching poos and wees is almost entirely composed of da peninsular [[Deccan|Deccan plateau]], which is flanked by two hilly coastal ranges, da [[Western Ghats]] poos and wees da [[Eastern Ghats]].Curry munching poos and wees's total poos and wees area is 2,973,190 sq. Km. Curry munching poos and wees is home to several major rivers, including da [[Ganges River|Ganges]], da [[Brahmaputra River|Brahmaputra]], da [[Yamuna]], da [[Godavari River|Godavari]], da [[Kaveri River|Kaveri]], da [[Narmada River|Narmada]], poos and wees da [[Krishna River|Krishna]]. Curry munching poos and wees has three archipelagos — [[Lakshadweep]], which lies off da southwestern coast; da volcanic [[Poos and weesaman poos and wees Nicobar Ispoos and weess]] ispoos and wees chain to da soudaast, poos and wees da [[Sunderbans]] in da [[Ganges Delta]] of West Bengal. Da climate in Curry munching poos and wees varies from [[tropical climate|tropical]] in da south to more [[temperate climate|temperate]] in da Himalayan north, where elevated regions receive sustained winter snowfall. Curry munching poos and wees's climate is strongly influenced by da Himalayas poos and wees da Thar Desert. Da Himalayas, along with da [[Hindu Kush]] mountains in Pakistan, prevent cold Central Asian [[katabatic wind]]s from blowing in. This keeps da bulk of da Curry munching poos and weesn subcontinent warmer than most locations at similar latitudes. Da Thar Desert is responsible for attracting da moisture-laden [[Monsoon#Southwest Summer Monsoon|summer monsoon]] winds that, between June poos and wees September, provide most of Curry munching poos and wees's rainfall. == Flora poos and wees fauna == [[Image:Trachypidacus-geei-cropped.jpg|thumb|right|Now da world's rarest monkey, da [[Gee's Golden Langur|golden langur]] typifies da precarious survival of much of Curry munching poos and wees's megafauna.]] {{main|Fauna of Curry munching poos and wees|Flora of Curry munching poos and wees}} Curry munching poos and wees, lying within da [[Indomalaya ecozone]], hosts significant [[biodiversity]]; it is home to 7.6% of all [[mammal]]ian, 12.6% of [[birds|avian]], 6.2% of [[reptile|reptilian]], poos and wees 6.0% of [[flowering plant]] species.Indira Gpoos and weeshi Conservation Monitoring Centre (IGCMC), New Delhi poos and wees da [http://www.unep-wcmc.org/ United Nations Environmental Program (UNEP), World Conservation Monitoring Center], Cambridge, UK. 2001. [http://ces.iisc.ernet.in/hpg/cesmg/curry munching poos and weesbio.html ''Biodiversity profile for Curry munching poos and wees'']. Many [[ecoregions in Curry munching poos and wees|ecoregions]], such as da ''[[shola]]'' [[South Western Ghats montane rain forests|forests]], also exhibit extremely high rates of [[endemic (ecology)|endemism]]; overall, 33% of Curry munching poos and weesn plant species are endemic.Botanical Survey of Curry munching poos and wees. 1983. Curry munching poos and wees's forest cover ranges from da [[Tropical poos and wees subtropical moist broadleaf forests|tropical rainforest]] of da [[Poos and weesaman Ispoos and weess]], [[Western Ghats]], poos and wees [[North-East Curry munching poos and wees|Nordaast Curry munching poos and wees]] to da [[Temperate coniferous forests|coniferous forest]] of da Himalaya. Between dase extremes lie da [[sal]]-dominated [[Tropical poos and wees subtropical moist broadleaf forests|moist deciduous]] forest of eastern Curry munching poos and wees; [[teak]]-dominated [[Tropical poos and wees subtropical dry broadleaf forests|dry deciduous]] forest of central poos and wees soudarn Curry munching poos and wees; poos and wees da [[Acacia nilotica indica|babul]]-dominated [[Deserts poos and wees xeric shrubpoos and weess|thorn forest]] of da central Deccan poos and wees western Gangetic plain.Tritsch, M.E. 2001. ''Wildlife of Curry munching poos and wees'' Harper Collins, London. 192 pages. ISBN 0007110626 Important Curry munching poos and weesn trees include da medicinal [[neem]], widely used in rural Curry munching poos and weesn [[herbalism|herbal]] remedies. Da [[pipal]] [[Ficus|fig]] tree, shown on da seals of [[Mohenjo-daro]], shaded da [[Gautama Buddha]] as he sought enlightenment. Many Curry munching poos and weesn species are descendants of [[taxa]] originating in [[Gondwana]], to which Curry munching poos and wees originally belonged.
